# siriemaplots

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of siriemaplots is to provide an easy dashboard to visualize and download plots (tables and graphs) from Siriema results

## Installation

You can install the development version of siriemaplots with:

``` r
#install.packages(devtools)
devtools::install.github("rdornas/siriemaplots")
```
